note: GDP per capita is measured in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices to account for inflation and differences in living costs between countries. The share of adults who use tobacco is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Share of adults who smoke vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Estimated percentage of adults aged 15 years and older who currently smoke or use tobacco. This includes smokeless products, such as chewing or snuffing tobacco, but excludes products that do not contain tobacco, such as e-cigarettes.
